item.description:
This discussion will be done in two parts.

Part one, presented by Jon, will cover the history and theory
behind the grid system as it applies to graphic design, web design and fine arts.

Part two, presented by Chris, will be covering the process and
practical applications of the grid system when used in web design.
item.why: To further your design knowledge and in depth study of practical use of grid systems

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: TUESDAY: Design For Web/ Print: Grid Theory
